testimonials.name: Sophia Martinez
testimonials.text: AtomWallet has completely transformed how we manage international payments. Transactions are fast, secure, and effortless.

testimonials.name: David Lee
testimonials.text: Sending money to partners abroad has never been this smooth. AtomWallet's real-time tracking gives us complete peace of mind.

testimonials.name: Amira Hassan
testimonials.text: The security features are outstanding. Multi-layer protection ensures our business transactions remain private and protected.

testimonials.name: Liam Anderson
testimonials.text: With AtomWallet, I can pay vendors and receive funds globally without worrying about hidden fees. Transparent and reliable!

testimonials.name: Chen Wei
testimonials.text: The interface is so intuitive. Within minutes, my team was making international payments without any training required.

hero.title: We are Tikit! - Driven by insight, powered by creativity.
hero.description: Driven by insight and creativity: the story behind "Tikit" — a regional agency powering brands, building trust, and delivering results.

images.funding: We helped our clients get +100M funding

cards.title: Influencer Marketing
cards.description: We connect brands with voices that matter. Through data-backed matchmaking and authentic collaborations, we help you reach audiences that trust and respond — turning influence into real impact.

cards.title: Social Media Management
cards.description: We manage your brand's online presence with precision and creativity. From planning to posting, we craft engaging content, track performance, and grow loyal communities that keep your brand at the center of the conversation.

cards.title: Production
cards.description: From concept to final cut, we bring bold ideas to life. Whether it's social content, branded visuals, or full-scale commercial shoots, our production team delivers quality storytelling that captures attention and drives action.

cards.title: Branding
cards.description: We build brands that stand out and stand for something. From visual identity to brand voice, we shape how audiences see, feel, and remember you — creating clarity, consistency, and connection at every touchpoint.

growth.title: We craft smart, scalable strategies that spark real growth
growth.description: From planning to execution, our teams turn creative vision into measurable results. The true sign of success? Clients who return — because they've seen the impact firsthand.
